dc_title_s: Map of the state of Colorado
dc_description_s: Extent: 1 map | Abstract: Map of Colorado showing land grants, forest reserves, railroads, land offices, etc. | Notes: Relief shown by shading.|Map detached from a United States Senate document in the United States congressional serial set (Serial Set 4220 S.doc.34): Letter from the Secretary of the Interior, transmitting a report of the Commissioner of Indian Affairs and accompanying draft of a bill providing for an appropriation to compensate the Confederated Bands of Ute Indians for the lands of their reservation in Colorado. | Scale 1:760,320 1 in. = 12 miles
